message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's an exceptional item that has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. I believe its unique features and benefits will be invaluable to you. For this extraordinary product, I am offering it to you at a special price of $15000. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your life or business.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was hoping to find a better price. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget. Would you be willing to consider this offer?
